name: sistema-busca-imoveis
description: Sistema completo de busca de im√≥veis com backend Rails API e frontend Vue.js

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && git subtree push --prefix=backend heroku main
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && rails db:create db:migrate db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && rails db:drop db:create db:migrate db:seed
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format:all: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend

author: Allan Knecht
